title: Bug 15899: Close All Saved does not work consistently
description: Close All Saved from the file menu does not consistently close all saved editors in build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
OB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, some saved editors remain open.
EB: I expect that when I select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all saved editors should be closed, leaving only unsaved changes or new files open.
SR:
1. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open multiple editor tabs.
3. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt).
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
